ISSUE.TITLE: Product SEO - Search engine friendly page name is not updated
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: beta 4.30 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1) GO Admin/Product/Edit/38 2) Go SEO panel try to change **Search engine friendly page name** 3) Click save continue 4) it should be change

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #4391 Fixed problem with saving search engine friendly page name
